required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: To Assess the Effect of Renal Impairment on the Blood Levels of Daclatasvir (DCV), Asunaprevir (ASV) and BMS-791325 After Multiple Doses of a Fixed Dose Combination Tablet
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-label, Multiple-dose Study to Evaluate the Pharmacokinetics, Safety, and Tolerability of a Fixed Dose Combination Formulation of DCV, ASV, and BMS-791325 in Subjects With Normal Renal Function and Subjects With Mild, Moderate, Severe, and End-stage Renal Dysfunction

brief_summary.textblock: Assess the effect of renal function on the blood levels of DCV, ASV, BMS-791325.

detailed_description.textblock:
IND Number: 79,599/101,943
Primary Purpose: Other - Phase 1 Clinical Pharmacology study to determine the effect of renal impairment on the exposure of DCV, ASV, BMS-791325 (fixed dosed combination) and BMS-791325 given in multiple doses
Fixed dose combination (FDC)
Fixed Dose Combination of Daclatasvir, Asunaprevir and BMS-791325 (DCV 3DAA FDC)

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum observed plasma concentration (Cmax) for DCV, ASV, BMS-791325 and BMS-794712
primary_outcome.time_frame: For Groups A-D: Day 1 to Day 10 and for Group E: Day 1 to Day 12

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration-time curve in 1 dosing interval (AUC(TAU)) for DCV, ASV, BMS-791325 and BMS-794712
primary_outcome.time_frame: For Groups A-D: Day 1 to Day 10 and for Group E: Day 1 to Day 12

secondary_outcome.measure: Concentration at 12 hours (C12) for (DCV, ASV, BMS-791325) and BMS-948158
secondary_outcome.time_frame: For Groups A-D: Day 1 to Day 11 and for Group E: Day 1 to Day 13

secondary_outcome.measure: Time of maximum observed concentration (Tmax) for (DCV, ASV, BMS-791325) and BMS-948158
secondary_outcome.time_frame: For Groups A-D: Day 1 to Day 11 and for Group E: Day 1 to Day 13

secondary_outcome.measure: Apparent total body clearance (CLT/F) for (DCV, ASV and BMS-791325 only)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: For Groups A-D: Day 1 to Day 11 and for Group E: Day 1 to Day 13

secondary_outcome.measure: Trough observed plasma concentration (Ctrough) for (DCV, ASV, BMS-791325), BMS-794712 and BMS-948158
secondary_outcome.time_frame: For Groups A-D: Day 1 to Day 11 and for Group E: Day 1 to Day 13

secondary_outcome.measure: Cmax fraction unbound (Cmaxfu) for (DCV, ASV, BMS-791325), BMS-794712 and BMS-948158
secondary_outcome.time_frame: For Groups A-D: Day 1 to Day 11 and for Group E: Day 1 to Day 13

secondary_outcome.measure: AUC(TAU) fraction unbound (AUC(TAU) fu) for (DCV, ASV, BMS-791325), BMS-794712 and BMS-948158
secondary_outcome.time_frame: For Groups A-D: Day 1 to Day 11 and for Group E: Day 1 to Day 13

secondary_outcome.measure: Protein Binding for DCV, ASV, BMS-791325 and BMS-794712
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 and 4 hours postdose on Day 10 (all subjects) and Day 12 (Group E only)

secondary_outcome.measure: Total amount recovered in urine (URt) for (DCV, ASV, BMS-791325) and BMS-794712
secondary_outcome.time_frame: For Groups A-D: Day 1 to Day 11 and for Group E: Day 1 to Day 13

secondary_outcome.measure: Total percent of administered dose recovered in urine (%URt) for (DCV, ASV, and BMS-791325 only)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: For Groups A-D: Day 1 to Day 11 and for Group E: Day 1 to Day 13

secondary_outcome.measure: Renal clearance (CLR) for DCV, ASV, BMS-791325, and BMS-794712
secondary_outcome.time_frame: For Groups A-D: Day 1 to Day 11 and for Group E: Day 1 to Day 13
For Groups A-D: Day 1 to Day 11 and for Group E: Day 1 to Day 13

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration-time curve in 1 dosing interval (AUC (TAU)) for BMS-948158
secondary_outcome.time_frame: For Groups A-D: Day 1 to Day 11 and for Group E: Day 1 to Day 13

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety based on occurrence of Adverse Event (AEs), Serious adverse event (SAEs) and AEs leading to discontinuation
secondary_outcome.time_frame: For Groups A-D: Day 1 to Day 11 and for Group E: Day 1 to Day 13

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety based on abnormalities in vital sign measurements
secondary_outcome.time_frame: For Groups A-D: Day 1 to Day 11 and for Group E: Day 1 to Day 13

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety based on findings on ECG measurements and physical examinations
secondary_outcome.time_frame: For Groups A-D: Day 1 to Day 11 and for Group E: Day 1 to Day 13

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety based on Marked abnormalities in clinical laboratory test findings
secondary_outcome.time_frame: For Groups A-D: Day 1 to Day 11 and for Group E: Day 1 to Day 13

arm_group.description: Group A to D: DCV 3DAA FDC + BMS-791325 oral tablets on specific days Group E: DCV 3DAA FDC + BMS-791325 oral tablets on specific days

intervention.other_name: Fixed Dose Combination of Daclatasvir, Asunaprevir and BMS-791325

criteria.textblock:
For more information regarding BMS clinical trial participation, please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com
Inclusion Criteria:
- Subjects in Group A must be in good health and have normal renal function
- Subjects in Groups B-E may have clinical, Electrocardiogram (ECG) and laboratory findings consistent with their degree of renal dysfunction
- Women of childbearing potential (WOCBP) and male participants must agree to follow the required contraceptive methods
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects in Group A must not have any significant acute or chronic illnesses
- Subjects in Groups B-E must not have uncontrolled or unstable cardiovascular, respiratory, hepatic, gastrointestinal, endocrine, hematopoietic, and/or neurological disease within 6 months of screening
- Subjects in Groups B-E may not have evidence of rapidly deteriorating renal function, defined as a screening creatinine clearance (CLcr) which has decreased from a previous CLcr by 50% within the last 3 months
- Prior exposure to DCV, ASV or BMS-791325 within 3 months prior to study drug administration

facility.name: New Orleans Center For Clinical Research - Knoxville
